Uses of Class
biz.gabrys.lesscss.compiler2.LessOptionsBuilder

  • Packages that use LessOptionsBuilder 
    Package Description
    biz.gabrys.lesscss.compiler2
    The LessCSS Compiler compiles Less source files to CSS code.

    • Uses of LessOptionsBuilder in biz.gabrys.lesscss.compiler2

      Methods in biz.gabrys.lesscss.compiler2 that return LessOptionsBuilder 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      LessOptionsBuilder LessOptionsBuilder.banner​(CharSequence banner)
      Sets a banner which will be inserted to a source file before the compilation (default: null).
      LessOptionsBuilder LessOptionsBuilder.bannerOff()
      Clears a value of the banner option (default: off).
      LessOptionsBuilder LessOptionsBuilder.compress​(boolean compress)
      Sets whether a CSS code should be compressed (default: false).
      LessOptionsBuilder LessOptionsBuilder.compressOff()
      Disables a CSS code compression (default: off).
      LessOptionsBuilder LessOptionsBuilder.compressOn()
      Enables a CSS code compression (default: off).
      LessOptionsBuilder LessOptionsBuilder.encoding​(CharSequence encoding)
      Sets an encoding used to read source files and save generated code (default: null - means platform default encoding).
      LessOptionsBuilder LessOptionsBuilder.encoding​(Charset encoding)
      Sets an encoding used to read source files and save generated code (default: null - means platform default encoding).
      LessOptionsBuilder LessOptionsBuilder.encodingPlatformDefault()
      Sets an encoding used to read source files and save generated code to platform default (default: platform default encoding).
      LessOptionsBuilder LessOptionsBuilder.fileSystems​(FileSystemOption... fileSystems)
      Sets available file systems (default: LessOptions.DEFAULT_FILE_SYSTEMS).
      LessOptionsBuilder LessOptionsBuilder.fileSystems​(Collection<? extends FileSystemOption> fileSystems)
      Sets available file systems (default: LessOptions.DEFAULT_FILE_SYSTEMS).
      LessOptionsBuilder LessOptionsBuilder.globalVariables​(LessVariableOption... globalVariables)
      Sets global variables (default: []).
      LessOptionsBuilder LessOptionsBuilder.globalVariables​(Collection<? extends LessVariableOption> globalVariables)
      Sets global variables (default: []).
      LessOptionsBuilder LessOptionsBuilder.globalVariablesOff()
      Clears global variables (default: off).
      LessOptionsBuilder LessOptionsBuilder.ieCompatibility​(boolean ieCompatibility)
      Sets whether a CSS code should be compatible with IE browser (default: true).
      LessOptionsBuilder LessOptionsBuilder.ieCompatibilityOff()
      Sets that a CSS code does not have to be compatible with IE browser (default: on).
      LessOptionsBuilder LessOptionsBuilder.ieCompatibilityOn()
      Sets that a CSS code should be compatible with IE browser (default: on).
      LessOptionsBuilder LessOptionsBuilder.includePaths​(CharSequence... includePaths)
      Sets available include paths (default: []).
      LessOptionsBuilder LessOptionsBuilder.includePaths​(Collection<? extends CharSequence> includePaths)
      Sets available include paths (default: []).
      LessOptionsBuilder LessOptionsBuilder.includePathsOff()
      Clears available include paths (default: off).
      LessOptionsBuilder LessOptionsBuilder.javaScript​(boolean javaScript)
      Sets whether a compiler should allow usage of JavaScript language (default: true).
      LessOptionsBuilder LessOptionsBuilder.javaScriptOff()
      Disallows usage of JavaScript language (default: on).
      LessOptionsBuilder LessOptionsBuilder.javaScriptOn()
      Allows usage of JavaScript language (default: on).
      LessOptionsBuilder LessOptionsBuilder.lineNumbers​(LineNumbersValue lineNumbers)
      Sets whether a compiler should generate inline source-mapping (default: LineNumbersValue.OFF).
      LessOptionsBuilder LessOptionsBuilder.lineNumbersAll()
      Enables generating inline source-mapping in comments blocks and @media queries (default: LineNumbersValue.OFF).
      LessOptionsBuilder LessOptionsBuilder.lineNumbersComments()
      Enables generating inline source-mapping in comments blocks (default: LineNumbersValue.OFF).
      LessOptionsBuilder LessOptionsBuilder.lineNumbersMediaQuery()
      Enables generating inline source-mapping in @media queries (default: LineNumbersValue.OFF).
      LessOptionsBuilder LessOptionsBuilder.lineNumbersOff()
      Disables generating inline source-mapping (default: LineNumbersValue.OFF).
      LessOptionsBuilder LessOptionsBuilder.modifyVariables​(LessVariableOption... modifyVariables)
      Sets modify variables (default: []).
      LessOptionsBuilder LessOptionsBuilder.modifyVariables​(Collection<? extends LessVariableOption> modifyVariables)
      Sets modify variables (default: []).
      LessOptionsBuilder LessOptionsBuilder.modifyVariablesOff()
      Clears modify variables (default: off).
      LessOptionsBuilder LessOptionsBuilder.relativeUrls​(boolean relativeUrls)
      Sets whether a compiler should rewrite relative URLs (default: false).
      LessOptionsBuilder LessOptionsBuilder.relativeUrlsOff()
      Disables rewriting relative URLs (default: off).
      LessOptionsBuilder LessOptionsBuilder.relativeUrlsOn()
      Enables rewriting relative URLs (default: off).
      LessOptionsBuilder LessOptionsBuilder.rootPath​(CharSequence rootPath)
      Sets a path which will be added to every generated import and URL in CSS code (default: null).
      LessOptionsBuilder LessOptionsBuilder.rootPathOff()
      Clears a value of the root path option (default: off).
      LessOptionsBuilder LessOptionsBuilder.silent​(boolean silent)
      Sets whether a compiler shouldn't log compilation warnings (default: false).
      LessOptionsBuilder LessOptionsBuilder.silentOff()
      Enables logging compilation warnings (default: off).
      LessOptionsBuilder LessOptionsBuilder.silentOn()
      Disables logging compilation warnings (default: off).
      LessOptionsBuilder LessOptionsBuilder.sourceMapBasePath​(CharSequence basePath)
      Sets a path that will be removed from each of the Less file paths inside the Source Map and also from the path to the map file specified in your output CSS (default: null).
      LessOptionsBuilder LessOptionsBuilder.sourceMapBasePathOff()
      Clears a value of the Source Map base path option (default: off).
      LessOptionsBuilder LessOptionsBuilder.sourceMapLessInline​(boolean inline)
      Sets whether a compiler should include all of the Less files in to the Source Map (default: false).
      LessOptionsBuilder LessOptionsBuilder.sourceMapLessInlineOff()
      Sets that a compiler will not include all of the Less files in to the Source Map (default: off).
      LessOptionsBuilder LessOptionsBuilder.sourceMapLessInlineOn()
      Sets that a compiler should include all of the Less files in to the Source Map (default: off).
      LessOptionsBuilder LessOptionsBuilder.sourceMapRootPath​(CharSequence rootPath)
      Sets a path that will be prepended to each of the Less file paths inside the Source Map and also to the path to the map file specified in your output CSS (default: null).
      LessOptionsBuilder LessOptionsBuilder.sourceMapRootPathOff()
      Clears a value of the Source Map root path option (default: off).
      LessOptionsBuilder LessOptionsBuilder.sourceMapUrl​(CharSequence url)
      Sets a path which will overwrite the URL in the CSS that points at the Source Map map file (default: null).
      LessOptionsBuilder LessOptionsBuilder.sourceMapUrlOff()
      Clears a value of the Source Map URL option (default: off).
      LessOptionsBuilder LessOptionsBuilder.strictImports​(boolean strictImports)
      Sets whether a compiler should disallow an @import operation inside of either @media blocks or other selector blocks (default: false).
      LessOptionsBuilder LessOptionsBuilder.strictImportsOff()
      Allows usage of @import operations inside of either @media blocks or other selector blocks (default: off).
      LessOptionsBuilder LessOptionsBuilder.strictImportsOn()
      Disallows usage of @import operations inside of either @media blocks or other selector blocks (default: off).
      LessOptionsBuilder LessOptionsBuilder.strictMath​(boolean strictMath)
      Sets whether a compiler should try and process all maths in Less code (default: false).
      LessOptionsBuilder LessOptionsBuilder.strictMathOff()
      Sets that a compiler shouldn't try and process all maths in Less code (default: off).
      LessOptionsBuilder LessOptionsBuilder.strictMathOn()
      Sets that a compiler should try and process all maths in Less code (default: off).
      LessOptionsBuilder LessOptionsBuilder.strictUnits​(boolean strictUnits)
      Sets whether a compiler should guess units in Less code when it does maths (default: false).
      LessOptionsBuilder LessOptionsBuilder.strictUnitsOff()
      Sets that a compiler shouldn't guess units in Less code when it does maths (default: off).
      LessOptionsBuilder LessOptionsBuilder.strictUnitsOn()
      Sets that a compiler should guess units in Less code when it does maths (default: off).
